body.name: FORTNITE Hasbro Victory Royale Series Lynx Collectible Action Figure with Accessories - Ages 8 and Up, 6-inch

features: UNLOCK VICTORY ROYALE SERIES: Unlock the Fortnite universe in the real world with the Victory Royale Series! Upgrade your collection with premium figures based on the Fortnite video game. You never know who’s dropping next, so ready up!

SHOW YOUR STYLE: Who needs nine lives when one is enough? This 6-inch Lynx action figure shows the fan-favorite character outfit in her black Stage 4 style with game-level detail, taking the on-shelf Battle Royale to the next level!

EXPAND YOUR LOCKER: Comes with Scratchmark Harvesting Tool, Stitches Back Bling, and compact submachine weapon accessories. Mix and match accessories between figures (Each sold separately. Subject to availability)
POSE WITH PERSONALITY: Pose out the Lynx figure in an epic battle stance or bust a move in a dance emote with more than 20 points of articulation!
UPGRADE YOUR COLLECTION: Look for other Fortnite Victory Royale Series figures to level up your collection! (Each sold separately. Subject to availability)
body.description: Ready up! The time has come to assemble a squad and unlock the legendary Fortnite game universe…in the real world. The Victory Royale Series takes Fortnite figures to the next level with highly poseable and detailed designs based on fan-favorite character outfits from the Fortnite video game. You never know who’s gonna drop into your collection next, but always remember to thank your bus driver. Lynx drops off the Battle Bus and glides into the Victory Royale Series! This 6-inch action figure shows the popular character outfit in her black Stage 4 style with with game-level deco and details. Comes with Scratchmark Harvesting Tool, Stitches Back Bling, and compact submachine weapon accessories. Pose out the Lynx figure in an epic battle stance or bust a move in a dance emote with more than 20 points of articulation! Look for other Fortnite Victory Royale Series figures to level up your collection! (Each sold separately. Subject to availability.) © 2021 Epic Games, Inc. Fortnite and its logo are trademarks of Epic Games, Inc. in the USA (Reg. U.S. Pat. & Tm. Off.) and elsewhere.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.8 4.8 out of 5 stars 640 ratings 4.8 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good start to a new era.
reviews.reviewText: I loved what Jazzwares did with their legendary series and as sad as I am with seeing it go I'm still impressed with Hasbro's foray into twelfth scale Fortnite territory. This is a character that I wanted in figure form for a while and I'm glad to finally get her. The sculpting and detail is great and she has all the articulation that you come to expect from a six inch Hasbro figure. Her accessories aren't bad either. She's atad on the small size but still scales well with other figures in this scale.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly Detailed for great orice
reviews.reviewText: This figure is actually done extremely well, it's a lot better than some figmas that I have ordered in the past, comes in cool box all items are painted well and overall I would say this is a great purchase I wish more characters were made by this company 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Limber and slender
reviews.reviewText: In many ways a superior female action figure than nearly the entire Marvel Legends line, and a good stand-in for Black Panther Shuri. Shame on Hasbro for letting this line die! Shame!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Can be used in so many different ways.
reviews.reviewText: When I saw the first trailer to “Black Panther Wakanda Forever,” the Panther showed at the end made me want to purchase this. I purchased a total of four and they are now Killmonger’s personal body guards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Kids love Fortnite the loved the toy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant, Cute, Detailed and Highly Articulated!
reviews.reviewText: Hasbro really showed a much better craftsmanship and articulation in Fortnite figures compared to other series. I hope we see other color variants of her too in future. Btw the stand in pics belongs to Figma Kusanagi Motoko it fits nicely to backpack hole and also they are standart stands you can use any Figma stand for action poses!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my daughter and she loves it! It's a high quality product and I am glad I ordered it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This toy has my vote. Go ahead and buy it.
reviews.reviewText: My daughter asked for this for her birthday. At first I was unsure that she would even play with this but she is attached. And a plus for me, it's very affordable!She played with this toy every single day. It is also very durable, my daughter is 8 and she plays very rough with her toys and it hasn't shown any signs that it could or might break. 10/10 recommended
Very good quality and articulation. She is just gorgeous. Looks right out of the game. I love the accessories. The molded détails on the armor are amazing too. If you are a fan of Lynx, do buy.

reviews.reviewTitle: Gran calidad y excelente detalle de pintura!!!
reviews.reviewText: La verdad no me gusta Fornite aunque la figura me llamó la atención y decidí comprarla...*Les debo confesar que este artículo me sorprendió mucho, tiene muy buenos detalles de pintura en todos lados.*Me encantó su articulación y la puedes poner de diferentes poces y sus accesorios me gustaron mucho.*Es más chica que las figuras de McFarlane (1 pulgada más chica)*La verdad recomiendo está figura y les garantizo que comprare la otra de color rojo.
Ottima figure, articolazioni colorazione e sculpt fantastici
Offert et l'intéressé a beaucoup apprécié.Des points d'articulations intéressant et des accessoires sympas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I love the figure only downside is the code on the box doesn’t work so don’t get disappointed in it when you by it all it will say is Code doesn’t exist 😓 I don’t no what it well give you from the code I was hoping for the skin Sadly sadly got noting just a Head Head up for those who are Wondering about it but Great figure
